caption.p: Antibacterial effects of ethanolic and methanolic extracts of Heptapleurum hypoleucum against. a S. pneumonae. b S. aureus. c S. typhii. d E. coli. e Shigella flexneri. Ethanolic extract showed the highest zone of inhibition against Staphylococcus aureus (21â€‰mm). Each of the plates is also showing the zone (white) produced by the commercial antibiotics against respective bacteria (as mentioned in Table 3)
